div.p: These codes are found in the CMS 1450 form. See HL7 OID information.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http//www.nubc.org/patient-discharge

description.value: These codes are found in the [CMS 1450](https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/CMS-Forms/CMS-Forms/CMS-Forms-Items/CMS1196256) form. See HL7 OID [information](http://www.hl7.org/oid/OID_view.cfm?&Comp_OID=2.16.840.1.113883.6.301.5).
